original_text: For a certain woman, whose young daughter had an unclean spirit, heard of him, and came and fell at his feet:
korean_text: 이에 더러운 귀신 들린 어린 딸을 둔 한 여자가 예수의 소문을 듣고 곧 와서 그 발 아래에 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: whose young daughter had an unclean spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어린 딸이 더러운 귀신을 들었는데

sentences.original_text: and came and fell at his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 와서 그의 발 앞에 엎드렸다
